full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement: Cancelled**


**Tender Reference Number:** PW-22-01005093
**Solicitation Number:** 22-195414


**Status: Annulled**
The government tender announcement with the solicitation number 22-195414 has been cancelled.


**Tender Details**
The tender was issued on August 23, 2022, with a closing date of November 18, 2022, at 14:00 local time.


**Industry Category: Service**
The tender falls under the service category (SRV), with no specific UNSPSC code mentioned.


**Trade Agreements:**
The tender is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and others.


**Contracting Entity:**
The contracting entity for this tender is Foreign Affairs, Trade, and Development (Department of), with an address at 125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0G2, Canada.


**Point of Contact:**
The point of contact for this tender is Claude Raymond, who can be reached at propositionsinternationales@international.gc.ca.


**Tender Description:**
This tender has been cancelled due to [insert reason here, if provided]. No further information is available on this tender.


**Attachments and Reference Documents:**
No attachments or reference documents are available for this tender.


**Note:**
The information provided in this tender announcement is subject to change. Bidders are advised to verify the accuracy of the information before submitting their proposals.


**Language:**
This tender announcement is available in both English and French. However, only English will be used for interpretation and translation purposes. French translations are provided for reference purposes only.
